page.title: 06A DAY IN THE LIFE OF-
page.content:
{A Day in the Life of our Family} { by Nathan Cole
Every day my dad works in London as a record seller. He gets up very early each morning and goes down stairs and has a shower. He gets mum a cup of tea.Then he says good-bye to us and goes to work. My mum goes to work on certain days as a shop assistant at Friar Tucks. I get dressed,have my breakfast,go and see my dad for a few minutes and after that I take Sadie,my sister,to school. When I come home from school I ride my bike.After I finish I have a shower,then put my pyjamas on.Then at 8.45.p.m.I go to bed.
